title: I don't understand this matchmaking!
body:
I just got out of a game as a level 25 (hello...NOT MAX LEVEL) where I queued up **by myself** and went against two diamond 3's, a gold 1, an unranked level 30, and a plat 3.  

On my team, we had a duo silver 2 and 4, a gold 5,  a plat 5 and me - a level 25.

And just so you know, I am nowhere near this level of play.

HOW DOES THIS MAKE ANY SENSE RIOT!  wtf... I'm confused af.

replies.body: because normals have their own mmr, and everyone runs a normals differently, some tryhard in norms, some troll out their ass in norms
They didn't troll, the game was won by the other team in under 20 minutes.

One match doesn't dictate 100 matches, thats what i meant, maybe on average they troll and their normals mmr is low while yours could actually be a bit higher.

There's alot of factors.
